title: Sandpiper Run
description: Sandpiper Run by Linda J Pifer"Each session is like opening an old book to the first page; it always begins the same." Sunnie ReynoldsWhile on vacation at the age of ten, Sunnie Reynolds disappeared on a small island in Florida. She was found ten hours later, asleep and draped over a tree stump in a marsh. A repeating nightmare began to awaken her each night.At twenty-two, Sunnie made a startling discovery and her nightmare became reality.
author: Linda J Pifer
